entry.name: swiperight
entry.title: swiperight
entry.desc: Triggered when a swipe event occurs moving in the right direction.

longdesc.p: Triggered when a horizontal drag of 30px or more (and less than 75px vertically) occurs within 1 second duration in the right direction. See the swipe event entry for more detailed information on the swipe event.

pre.code:
...
... $(function(){ // Bind the swiperightHandler callback function to the swipe event on div.box $('div.box').on( 'swiperight', swiperightHandler ); // Callback function references the event target and adds the 'swipe' class to it function swiperightHandler( event ){ $(event.target).addClass( 'swiperight' ); } });

longdesc.p: Swipe the green rectangle in the right direction to see the above code applied.

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: A function to invoke after the the swipe event fires.
